section.name: Conclusion
section.summary:
Thank you for joining us in this exploration of principles and practices for meeting the needs of ALL adult ELs! 

To complete the course:

  • View the conclusion video.
  • Complete the post-course assessment to test your current understanding of the principles covered in the course. This is the same self-assessment you completed during the introduction to the course. By repeating it, you can see how your understanding of the principles has grown and can revisit the goals you set for yourself after completing the pre-course assessment.
